rundown: 4-2 W @ Cincinnati Reds Hurston Waldrep: 5.2 innings, 1 earned run, 3 hits, 0 HR, 4 strikeouts Batters: Eli White (2 hits - 4 AB, 2 HR, 4 RBI) Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves secured a victory against the Cincinnati Reds with a strong offensive performance, highlighted by Eli White's two home runs and four RBIs. Waldrep's solid pitching kept the Reds at bay, allowing only one earned run over 5.2 innings. Key highlights include: 1. Eli White's standout performance with two home runs and four RBIs. 2. Waldrep's effective pitching, striking out four batters and limiting hits. 3. The Braves' balanced attack with ten hits, contributing to their four runs.
